snippet: Ten pieces of jewelry valued at $127,000 vanished from the West Village home of Julianne Moore amid a renovation project, the police said, and no arrests have been made.
abstract: Ten pieces of Cartier jewelry, valued at $127,000, disappear from the West Village home of actress Julianne Moore amid a renovation project on the five-floor brownstone; no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: Ten pieces of jewelry valued at $127,000 vanished from the West Village home of Julianne Moore amid a renovation project, the police said, and no arrests have been made.

headline.seo: Julianne Moore’s West Village Home Is Robbed of $127,000 in Cartier Jewelry
headline.main: Cartier Jewelry Disappears From an Actress’s Home
headline.print_headline: Cartier Jewelry Disappears From Home Of an Actress
